articles.title: Delegation of Cuban Foreign Ministry Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Cuban Foreign Ministry Here
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Cuban Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Director General for Bilateral Affairs Gerardo Penalver Portal arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Senior Officials of Party, State and Army Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Officials of Party, State and Army Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So and other senior party, state and army officials and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the 54th Day of Songun.
					 Laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the WPK Central Military Commission, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The visitors paid high tribute to the statues in the humblest reverence.
					
					 They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips until the last moments of their lives.
					
					 That day service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people in Pyongyang visited the palace to pay homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Cuban Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuban Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Cuban Ministry of Foreign Affairs visited the statutes of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The members of the delegation laid a bouquet before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in humble reverence and paid tribute to them who made immortal contributions to the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) headed by Ho Myong Do, vice department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the 54th Day of Songun.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence as they made immortal contributions to the development of the Juche-oriented overseas compatriots movement.
					
					 They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips until the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The head of the delegation wrote in a visitor's book that he would defend the Juche-based idea on the overseas compatriots movement and undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and take the lead in the drive to open a new heyday of Chongryon under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chief and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the palace to pay homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by the visiting delegation of the Saitama Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned on Monday by head of the delegation Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- All service personnel and people of the DPRK are paying deepest respects and extending eternal glory to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 54th Day of Songun.
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions at various levels, enterprises, factories, farms and schools here and the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 An endless stream of people visited the statutes of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling President and leader at Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues and portraits of the smiling President and leader in their residential quarters.

articles.title: Day of Songun Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Songun Celebrated in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK celebrated with splendor the Day of Songun on Monday, the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The people paid tribute to the portraits of the smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the park of the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where they lie in state.
					
					 Service personnel, working people, school youth and children visited the statues on Mansu Hill and portraits of the smiling Generalissimos across the country.
					
					 Performances were given at the theatres in the capital city and local areas.
					
					 A revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was given by the National Theatrical Troupe at the National Theatre in the capital.
					
					 The artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe presented colorful numbers including male solo "Our Arms" and mixed quartet "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Acrobats of the National Circus performed at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre 
					
					 The National Symphony Orchestra gave a concert at the Hamhung Grand Theatre while the art troupes of North Phyongan, North Hamgyong and South Hwanghae provinces gave performances.
					
					 Diverse sports games and cultural events took place at the construction sites of stockbreeding base in Sepho area and Wisong Scientists Street and at institutions, industrial establishments and farms such as the Chollima Steel Complex.
					
					 The festive mood revved up with the dancing parties of the youth and students.

articles.title: Song and Dance Performance Given
articles.content:
Song and Dance Performance Given
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Song and dance performance "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" was given by the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Monday, the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam and other senior officials of the party, state and army, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, officials and men of meritorious services of institutions, factories and enterprises in Pyongyang.
					
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Long Live Great Songun Brilliant Commander", female solo "Oh, My Motherland of Songun", mixed duet and pangchang "On Steep Mountain Road of This Country," female chorus "Attraction and Reverence" and male chorus "Let's Defend the Party with Our Lives".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying revolutionary feats Kim Jong Il performed by shattering vicious moves of the imperialists and leading to victory the struggle to defend socialism and red flag.
					
					 Also put on the stage were songs "Our Dear Supreme Commander" and "People's Joy" and epilogue "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation". They tell about the immutable truth that the army and people of the DPRK are sure to always win as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Monday, the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 At the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Arch of Triumph and other places of the capital city youth and students danced to the tune of songs "Long Live Great Songun Brilliant Commander," "Let's Sing of General Dear to People" and "Our General Is the Best".
					
					 The festive atmosphere revved up when the band played songs "Joy of the People" and "Our Leader Loved by People." 
					
					 The participants presented cheerful dances to the tune of songs "July 27 March" and "Let Us Meet at the Front".
					
					 Dancing parties also took place at the provincial seats on Monday.

articles.title: Grapes Sent to Children in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Grapes Sent to Children in Pyongyang 
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Fragrant grapes were sent to the children of nurseries and kindergartens, baby home and orphanage and Mirim School in Pyongyang. They were harvested at the vineyard of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 President Kim Il Sung personally cultivated grape vine on an experimental basis and named them. Grapes are heavily laden with fruits this year, too.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is showing warm loving care and solicitude for all children across the country as their real father would do, made sure that grapes harvested at the vineyard were sent to the children of the capital city.
					
					 Trucks carrying the grapes arrived at the nurseries, kindergartens, baby home and orphanage and the school on Sunday and Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Has Also Right to Make Preemptive Strike: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Has Also Right to Make Preemptive Strike: Minju Joson 
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean warmongers are staging madcap north-targeted joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Guardian across south Korea with huge armed forces and civilians involved. 
					 Minju Joson Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 UFG is the nuclear war exercises aimed at stifling the DPRK by force of arms by mounting a surprise preemptive attack on it and a product of the U.S. harsh hostile policy towards the former from A to Z. 
					
					 The U.S. kicked off UFG not in the hope to see the tension defused on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. must be aware very well that UFG will strain the situation on the peninsula as was the case with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. finally kicked off UFG, talking about "provocation" and "deterrence" of someone, because it is interested in deteriorating the situation on the peninsula. 
					
					 It is calculation of the U.S. that it can maintain its military edge in Asia as its future development and interests hinge on the Asia-Pacific region and only when it controls and contains its strategic rivals and potential foes in the region. 
					
					 This indicates that the Korean peninsula has fallen victim to the U.S. in its scenario for carrying out the strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region and the rest of the world. 
					
					 The DPRK has also the right to make a preemptive strike. 
					
					 Now that the U.S. declared a war against the DPRK, it has the right to mount the most powerful and advanced preemptive attack of Korean style on it any time.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday carries an article on the first anniversary of the publication of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks to be fulfilled to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 This work is not only another precious ideological and moral treasure of the country to go down in the history of Songun revolution but immortal guidelines to be held fast to in the on-going general advance for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is making ceaseless journeys for Songun revolutionary leadership, regarding the Songun idea and feats of Kim Jong Il as an invincible weapon.
					
					 Under his outstanding and tested guidance the Korean People's Army has grown to be a matchless army with steadfast ideology and faith and invincible combat capability and a powerful Paektusan revolutionary army regarding the party's flag of Juche as its first colors of the revolution and the country has been converted into an ideological power and impregnable fortress.
					
					 The stirring reality of the DPRK ushering in a heyday of Songun Korea by bringing about fresh leap forward in all fields for building a thriving nation through a high-pitched drive for creating the Korean speed and the shining victories being won in the confrontation with the U.S. would be unthinkable without the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers are making desperate efforts to block the Korean people advancing along the road of Songun.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun are sure to triumph as long as the Songun revolutionary idea indicates the road ahead of the Korean people and there are the party's wise leadership, the single-minded unity of the army and people and the matchless KPA.

articles.title: DPRK Papers Laud Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats
articles.content:
DPRK Papers Laud Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers on Monday carry editorials praising the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army to start the Songun revolution was an expression of his firm will to advance the Korean revolution along the road of Songun by successfully carrying forward the tradition of Songun started in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He, on the basis of making a deep insight into the rapidly changing situation and trend of the revolutionary development with his far-sighted wisdom and rare penetration in the mid-1990s, successfully settled the matters arising in the revolutionary struggle in our times, holding aloft the banner of Songun.
					
					 He established the state machinery of Korean style with the National Defence Commission as its pivot and applied the principle of giving priority to military affairs to all fields of the revolution and construction to open a new chapter of socialist politics.
					
					 He stood on the forefront for defending the country all his life, steadily leading the cause of building the Juche-type army on a high level and developing the Korean People's Army into an elite army.
					
					 The national defence industry has turned into an arsenal of Mt. Paektu capable of manufacturing any sophisticated weapon as it pleases and the country is demonstrating its might as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state today. All these would be unthinkable without his tireless leadership.
					
					 It was the greatest feat that he provided a sure guarantee for glorifying the history of the victorious Songun revolution in the new century of Juche, foreseeing the future of the country and nation.
					
					 The cause of the Songun revolution which made a triumphant advance under the leadership of Kim Jong Il is winning victorties under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Minju Joson says the cause of the Songun revolution is sure to win as long as there are the idea of the Songun revolution that indicates the road to be followed by the army and people of the DPRK, the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, the single-minded unity of the army and people and the matchless revolutionary armed forces.

articles.title: DPRK Will Remain Loyal to Principle and Idea of NAM: Papers
articles.content:
DPRK Will Remain Loyal to Principle and Idea of NAM: Papers
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 39th anniversary of the DPRK's admission into the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM).
					 On this occasion papers Monday in articles say the DPRK will as ever remain loyal to the principle and idea of the NAM and make all efforts to strengthen it.
					
					 The DPRK's admission into the NAM marked an important occasion in increasing the ranks of the NAM and putting spurs to strengthening it, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has played a positive role in developing the NAM.
					
					 The whole proud course covered by the NAM and its steady development would be unthinkable without the outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who paid deep attention to developing the NAM into a powerful engine in the present era.
					
					 Entering the new century, the DPRK has firmly adhered to its idea and principle. 
					
					 The prevailing situation urgently requires the member nations of the NAM including the DPRK to remain true to its basic idea and mission.
					
					 The international tensions and the danger of a war are increasing and acute and complicated issues are presenting themselves before the international community. This is entirely attributable to the moves of the imperialists for aggression and interference in internal affairs of other countries.
					
					 The NAM should wage a dynamic struggle to realize global independence, prevent a nuclear war, terminate colonialism and racism, accomplish the cause of national liberation, achieve South-South cooperation and self-sustenance in economy and establish a new international order.
					
					 Minju Joson says the history of the NAM is associated with the leadership feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by developing the NAM, adding that it will grow stronger along with the victorious advance of the era of independence.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on August 23 on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership through the visit to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army was a historic event in which he declared before the world the steadfast faith and will to accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche which was pioneered and won one victory after another with arms under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the letter said.
					
					 The sacred revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il who led the revolution and construction to a brilliant victory for more than five decades after starting the Songun revolutionary leadership are vividly recorded in the history of the country and his undying Songun revolutionary feats which will be exalted along with the prosperity of the socialist country are always shining in the hearts of the people in the homeland and Koreans in China, it noted.
					
					 Bearing in mind the faith that there is the future of the prospering socialist homeland as it is led by Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, we will resolutely reject the reckless racket for confrontation with fellow countrymen and war moves for invading the north by the U.S. and the puppet forces trying to inflict disaster of a nuclear war on the nation, and wage a more dynamic struggle for defending peace against the U.S. and war, it stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Founding to Be Marked in Egypt
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Founding to Be Marked in Egypt
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 66th anniversary of the DPRK was formed in Cairo on August 20.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events, including seminar, photo exhibition and film show, in the period between August 20 and September 9.

articles.title: Day of Songun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Songun Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- An event took place in Romania, seminar in Mexico, DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition and film show in Peru and round-table talks in Ethiopia between August 14 and 19. They marked the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 Displayed there were photos showing the Songun revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. Also on display were books and photos introducing achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					 Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" was screened.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said that August 25 is the significant day when HE Kim Jong Il started the Songun leadership, adding: Thanks to his leadership the DPRK is now shedding its rays as a beacon of hope of the world progressives aspiring after socialism while displaying the dignity as an invincible power the imperialists dare not provoke.
					
					 The director for education and culture in Piura City, Piura Province, Peru expressed belief that the DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition would mark an occasion in helping the Peruvian people know better about the DPRK and deepening the feelings of friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The director of a dental hospital of Ethiopia praised Kim Jong Il for firmly defending the sovereignty of the DPRK and socialism and making great contributions to the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world with his great Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigerian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigerian Website 
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on August 20. 
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Beninese Organizations Assail UFG
articles.content:
Beninese Organizations Assail UFG
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on August 19 denouncing the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are staging UFG despite the unanimous protest and denunciation of the world peace-loving people.
					
					 UFG, being escalated every year, is war maneuvers for aggression staged pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves of the south Korean authorities for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 In a bid to conceal the aggressive nature and danger of UFG, the U.S. is describing it as "annual and defensive one" this time, too.
					
					 Condemning joint military exercises the U.S. is staging ceaselessly while increasing their scale and scope several times a year on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity as an unpardonable criminal act of disturbing the regional peace and security, we demand it halt at once UFG for aggression.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country under the guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Condemn UFG
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Condemn UFG
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- If the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces persist in the joint military exercises while reeking off the smell of powder, it will bring earlier their ruin.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on August 18.
					
					 Expressing full support to a statement released by the spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army and a statement issued by the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry, the joint statement said:
					
					 There is a limit to the patience of socialist Korea.
					
					 The iron-willed Songun treasured sword of the revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu will find out all bases of aggressors in the world and reduce them to ashes.
					
					 There is no place on the earth where the U.S. imperialists can hide.
					
					 Stop at once the criminal Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					
					 The U.S., hands off Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, pull out of south Korea at once.

articles.title: British Organizations Condemn S. Korean Authorities for Suppressing Progressive Forces
articles.content:
British Organizations Condemn S. Korean Authorities for Suppressing Progressive Forces
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK and other British progressive organizations released a joint statement on Aug. 16 denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities for suppressing the Unified Progressive Party.
					 The statement said:
					
					 At the recent second trial on the UPP's involvement in the case of the attempted rebellion, the south Korean authorities sentenced those suspected to prison terms on charges of the violation of the "Security Law". This is a base measure aimed to clamp down the progressive forces aspiring after reunification, independence and democracy.
					
					 The above-said attempted rebellion is a sheer fabrication.
					
					 South Korea turned into a huge fascist jail where progressives are punished by evil law.
					
					 South Korea where the rich gets richer and the poor poorer is ruled by the corrupt group kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 South Korea offers a fabulous amount of money every year to the U.S. as the upkeep for the U.S. forces present in it.
					
					 It is quite natural for the people who were disillusioned with the reality of south Korea to struggle for independence and reunification with progressive idea.
					
					 South Korea is the worst tundra of human rights.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are perpetrating a hypocritical act of accusing the DPRK of its human rights performances while throwing progressives behind bars. 
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to retract all judgments inflicted upon members of the UPP and immediately abolish the "Security Law", a fascist law.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
						
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 54o aniversario del Dia del Songun, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 25 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Fue depositado alli un cesto de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Los participantes rindieron el sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de ordenes de los Generalisimos, las otras de conservacion de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas para visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
					
					El mismo dia, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios y trabajadores de varias unidades de la capital visitaron el supremo lugar sagrado del Juche para rendir homenaje a los Generalisimos.

articles.title: RPDC celebra el Dia del Songun
articles.content:
RPDC celebra el Dia del Songun
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los militares y civiles coreanos celebraron el dia 25 el 54o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					Ellos visitaron el parque en la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, supremo lugar sagrado del Juche donde estan conservados los cuerpos de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, y rindieron el sublime homenaje a esos grandes hombres ante sus imagenes con amplia sonrisa. 
					
					Las estatuas de bronce y las imagenes sonrientes de los Generalisimos en la capitalina colina Mansu y otras localidades del pais tambien estaban llenas de militares, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares. 
					
					En los teatros centrales y locales se ofrecieron las funciones festivas. 
					
					En el capitalino Teatro Nacional de Drama el Conjunto Dramatico Nacional ofrecio el drama revolucionario "Bajo la bandera de la victoria". 
					
					En el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este los artistas del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae pusieron en la escena el solo masculino "Nuestro fusil", el cuarteto mixto "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo!" y otras piezas de diversos generos. 
					
					En el Circo de Pyongyang los acrobatas del Conjunto Circense Nacional de Pyongyang ofrecieron la funcion.
					
					En el Gran Teatro de Hamhung tuvo lugar el concierto de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional. En tanto, los conjuntos artisticos de las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte, Hamgyong del Norte y Hwanghae del Sur ofrecieron funciones festivas.
					
					Se realizaron diversas actividades deportivas y culturales en los campos de construccion de la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho y la avenida de cientificos Wisong, el Complejo de Acero Chollima y otros organismos, empresas, fabricas y granjas.
					
					Por la noche de este dia los jovenes y estudiantes aumentaron con bailes el ambiente festivo.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico del EPC
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa la funcion de musica y danza del Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito Popular de Corea "Victoria continua generacion tras generacion" en celebracion del 54o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					La vieron Kim Yong Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas de la capital y ameritados capitalinos.
					
					En la escena de la funcion se pusieron el coro "Viva el gran General Insigne del Songun", el solo femenino "Mi patria del Songun", el coro femenino "Encanto y veneracion", el solo masculino "Soy tu eterno hijo", el coro masculino "Defendamos a riesgo de la vida el Comite Central del Partido", entre otras piezas. 
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las imborrables proezas revolucionarias del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien condujo a la victoria una batalla defensiva socialista igual a una guerra mundial, tras superar las maniobras obstinadas de os imperialistas.
					
					Tambien se pusieron en la escena "Nuestro intimo Comandante Supremo", "Jubilo de pueblo" y el epilogo "Victoria continua generacion tras generacion" y otras piezas que muestran la verdad de que el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos salen siempre victoriosos gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					La funcion arranco efusivas ovaciones de los espectadores.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes festejan Dia del Songun
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes festejan Dia del Songun 
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los jovenes y estudiantes de todas las localidades del pais festejaron hoy con bailes el 54o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					En las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang, el Arco de Triunfo y otros lugares de la capital ellos bailaron al compas de las canciones "Viva el gran General Insigne del Songun", "Nuestro General es el mejor" y otras. 
					
					Las canciones "Jubilo de pueblo", "Es mejor su regazo" y "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo" aumentaron el ambiente festivo. 
					
					Los participantes bailaron cantando las canciones "Marcha del 27 de julio", "Victoria continua generacion tras generacion" y "Nos veremos en el frente".
					
					Este dia, hubo tales bailes en todas las cabezas provinciales.
